Viral Campaign

We use proven techniques, which our marketers utilise intentionally to spread your song quickly.

Just like a biological virus, a viral marketing campaign spreads from one person to another, resulting in a large number of views, substantial amount of social shares and remarkable brand awareness.

We achieve this also via influencer collaborations, brand sponsorships, advertising, contracting third parties, radio submission, playlist rotation, viral videos distributed on selected socials media platforms as well our extensive network of entertainment partners.
